title: Kailash Mansarovar Yatra 11 Nights 12 Days ex Kathmandu - Helicopter Route
description: Experience the sacred Kailash Mansarovar Yatra via helicopter route from Kathmandu. This premium 12-day journey combines helicopter flights with the spiritual pilgrimage, offering comfort and convenience while maintaining the sacred essence of the yatra. The helicopter route significantly reduces travel time while providing breathtaking aerial views of the Himalayas.

itinerary.title: Arrival Kathmandu (1300m
itinerary.description: Upon arrival in Kathmandu Airport, you will be greeted and assisted by our representative after completing your custom formalities,transfer to the hotel for check-in. Overnight at Kathmandu Hotel.

itinerary.title: Kathmandu Sightseeing - Fly to Nepalgunj (150M ,1 Hrs)
itinerary.description: After breakfast Kathmandu city sightseeing tour, visit  Pasupatinath Temple,Bouddhanath Stupa(World heritage site),Jala Narayan Temple(sleeping Vishnu) back to hotel take lunch evening fly to Nepalgunj,arrive at Nepalgunj transfer to hotel for check in.Overnight at Nepalhunj.

itinerary.title: Nepalgunj - Fly to Simikot (2800M ,50 Min)
itinerary.description: After breakfast transfer to domestic airport ,fly to Simikot, arrive at Simikot airport, transfer to hotel for check in. Evening short walk to lord Shiva Temple back to hotel. Overnight at Simikot.

itinerary.title: Simikot - Fly to Hilsa by Helicopter - Drive to Purang (3700M,35 km,2 Hrs)
itinerary.description: After breakfast fly to Hilsa by Helicopter (20 Min, 15 Kg weight limit for baggage) wait for the others member to arrive at Hilsa (since it is a group visa and everyone have to enter Tibet side in one group) complete immigration and custom formalities in Nepal - China both side continue drive to Purang ,on the way we have to pass up to 2 Checkpoints where checking might take upto 1 hour each check post) transfer to the Hotel for check-in.overnight at Purang hotel.

itinerary.title: Purang Acclimatization Day (3900M)
itinerary.description: After breakfast all day is free for acclimatization today you can buy Kailash kora clothes,bottle,sticks and others trekking gears for parikrama.Overnight at Purang hotel.

itinerary.title: Purang - Drive to Mansarovar Parikrama (4550M,102 km,4 Hrs - Holy bath,Pooja,Homa)
itinerary.description: After breakfast drive to Rakshas Tal (40 km, 1.5 hrs) on the way you will have to pass 1 check point. After reaching Rakshas Tal you will see Gurla Mandhata Parvat and first view of Mt.Kailash south face and Manasarovar Lake, 40 Km drive we reach Mansarovar continue Parikrma of Mansarovar lake by Vehicle (102 Km,4 Hrs) and Overnight at the Shore of the Lake.

itinerary.title: Mansarovar - Drive to Yamdwar (60 Km,2 Hrs)- Trek to Diraphuk (4860M, 12 Km - First Day of Kora)
itinerary.description: After breakfast short drive to Darchen, visit Yamdwar.This is starting point of Kora.We will trek to Diraphuk which is 12 km trek (7/8 Hrs) crossing west face of Mt.Kailash,You will visit North face of Mt.Kailash. Arrive at Diraphuk ,transfer to the Guest house for check-in.overnight at Diraphuk.

itinerary.title: Diraphuk - Trek to Zutalphuk (4600M,22 Km - 2nd Day of kora Cross Dolmala Pass)
itinerary.description: After breakfast trek to Dolma -La Pass and trek to Zutalphuk(22 Km,9/10 hrs Trek).This is the most difficult journey throughout  the the yatra since you have to trek up to (5630m) height. From decent to Gaurikund & trek to Zutulphuk following river. Arrive at Zutalphuk transfer to the Guest house for check-in.overnight at Zutalphuk.

itinerary.title: Zutalphuk - Trek to Darchen(08 Km/3 Hrs - Drive to Hilsa  (3700M,100 km 03 Hrs)
itinerary.description: After breakfast short trek ( 8 Km ,2 Hrs) and reach to the point where our coach will be waiting and we will drive to Darchen and merge with other member  who were waiting and drive to Hilsa border formalities both side China - Nepal, transfer to hotel for check in.Overnight at Hilsa.

itinerary.title: Hilsa -Fly to  Simikot by Heli -Fly to Nepalgunj – Fly to Kathmandu
itinerary.description: After breakfast fly to Simikot by Helicopter (20 Mins), Take connecting flight to  Nepalgunj again fly back to Kathmandu.arrival at Kathmandu transfer to hotel for check in. Overnight at Kathmandu.

itinerary.title: Bhaktapur Durbar Squire and Doleshwar Mahadev Temple
itinerary.description: After breakfast fly to Simikot by Helicopter (20 Mins), Take connecting flight to  Nepalgunj again fly back to Kathmandu.arrival at Kathmandu transfer to hotel for check in. Overnight at Kathmandu.

itinerary.title: Kathmandu departure transfer
itinerary.description: After breakfast we will be provide appreciation certificate of Kailash Mansarovar Yatra later drop to airport for final departure.
